project.Title: The Rightful Heir
project.ItemDescription:
[i]"Reared on tales of his family’s former glory, the Heir sought to reclaim it. Miscalculating the true extent of the nightmare that awaited and educated for a life of indolence, he is ill-equipped for adventure in both mind and body. Wracked with guilt and emboldened by wine, the Heir resolves to share the burden of this arduous quest." [/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/LDJGRgA.jpg[/img]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~GAMEPLAY
Heir grants additional heirlooms as loot from the fight and from interacting with curios. He also increases stack size of all heirlooms. Both the battle bonus and stack size increases the more heirs you have in your party.
Combat Skills: Letter Opener [img]https://i.imgur.com/b6FJiLy.png[/img] OOOO OOOX Forward 1, Ignores armor
Panic! [img]https://i.imgur.com/lDvFAFk.png[/img] XXOO OOOX Back 2, targets random enemy
Have a Taste! [url=https://i.imgur.com/qZYJDN6.png][img]https://i.imgur.com/Q0dgOOu.png[/img][/url] 00XX X000 Small damage, applies a blight to a target enemy
A Snifter to Share [img]https://i.imgur.com/xpwAOHc.png[/img] OOXX OOOO Heals ally and Heir. Stress heal to ally, Stress damage to Heir
Drown My Sorrows [img]https://i.imgur.com/u41acik.png[/img] 0000 Self heal and stress heal
Research [img]https://i.imgur.com/0FNIH2M.png[/img] 00XX 0000 Debuff's enemy for -ACC and +Damage taken
Promotion [img]https://i.imgur.com/bhf3Ay7.png[/img] 000X 0000 Gives an ally a stress heal and Resolve XP Bonus. On higher levels additionally grants small combat buffs
Camping Skills:
Patched Maps [img]https://i.imgur.com/zciy2qp.png[/img] (Cost: 3 Respite points) - 25% scouting chance for 4 battles
Fine Wine [img]https://i.imgur.com/tEtSk1m.png[/img] (Cost: 5 Respite points) - -10 stress, -15% stress taken for whole party
Supplies [img]https://i.imgur.com/nCYNVLU.png[/img] (Cost: 1 Respite point, limit per camp: 2) - Produces a random supply item
Motivational Speech [img]https://i.imgur.com/Vtsgl7u.png[/img] (Cost: 4 Respite points) - Gives a variety of random buffs to all allies. Might stress heir out.
Vanilla Trinkets:
Old Monocle (Common) [img]https://i.imgur.com/yQwzits.png[/img] +5 ACC, -4 DODGE, +10% scouting chance
Corkscrew (Common) [img]https://i.imgur.com/FG5ZzOK.png[/img] +15% Melee DMG, +10% Melee ACC, -3 SPD
Spoiled Wine (Uncommon) [img]https://i.imgur.com/hU2if2A.png[/img] +30% Blight Skill Chance, +50% Blight Amount, -200% Healing skills. On friendly Skill: Blight 1 per 3(70% base), +5 stress
Stylish Tailcoat (Uncommon) [img]https://i.imgur.com/E3GrKeU.png[/img] +20% DODGE multiplier, -4 SPD, +10% stress
University Textbook (Rare) [img]https://i.imgur.com/87gRnY7.png[/img] +10% Resolve XP, +30% Debuff Skill Chance
Tasting Wine (Very Rare) [img]https://i.imgur.com/lBv1OpC.png[/img] +40% Stress Skills, -200% Blight Skill Chance, -10 DODGE, On Friendly Skill: Buff target for -15% Stress taken, +3 SPD
Mincemeat (Pet) [img]https://i.imgur.com/qRNkM8c.png[/img] +10% scout chance, +100% food eaten, -30 dodge, on attack: self: activate riposte (2 turns)
For DLC Trinkets, check out: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1649053980]this [/url]
